text:
THE UNIVERSITY OF CHICAGO
CHICAGO 37 • ILLINOIS
THE HOME-STUDY DEPARTMENT
October 2k, 1957
National Association
of Educational Broadcasters
Gregory Hall
The University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
Gentlemen:
Would you be good enough to send me a copy of the report
by Mr. James W. Sawyer and Mr. Charles M. Woodliff—the
report to which reference is made on the enclosed post¬
card.
Thank you for your courtesy.
Director
LSS/ah
